news.title: Hashdump Meeting Times
news.content: Our meetings are on every other Monday from 5:00-6:00pm in CSB 305. All majors are welcome, no experience in cybersecurity necessary!  Connect with us over Discord!

news.title: Mountain West Cyber Challenge
news.content: The Mountain West Cyber Challenge is a Capture the Flag (CTF) competition happening later this month. Registration closes January 6th, with the event taking place January 10th over Zoom. For more information, see the competition website.
